# Contracts

`zksync2-java` implements contract wrappers. Created using [web3j CLI](https://docs.web3j.io/4.8.7/command_line_tools/#solidity-smart-contract-wrapper-generator)

## `Generated wrappers`

- `ERC20`
- `IEthToken`
- `IL1Bridge`
- `IL1Messenger`
- `IL2Bridge`
- `INonceHolder`
- `IZkSync`
- `ZkSyncContract`
